text: Will Smith has become the latest celebrity to take on the In My Feelings challenge, taking the viral dance to new heights in Budapest. The Fresh Prince scaled a bridge in the Hungarian capital to show off his moves to Drake ’ s track, a dance craze started by comedian Shoker last month. In the video posted on his Instagram page, Smith admitted : “ There ’ s no way … no way this is legal, ” as he made his way to the very top of the bridge and copied the moves. At the end, he said : “ I woke up this morning in my feelings and I was like, ‘ I got to let them out! ” Smith captioned the post : “ Last day in Budapest. I woke up # InMyFeelings “ I ’ ma Keep It 100..
